pageProduct.name: Alpha Keri Super Hydrating Moisturising Lotion 1 Litre
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Banish crocodile skin and instantly hydrate skin with this concentrated repairing lotion. The fast absorbing lotion restores and locks in moisture to visibly improve skin texture.  Excellent in reducing flakiness and skin tightness.   Enjoy healthy, hydrated and radiantly soft velvety skin that hydrates continuously for 24 hours and wear your skin with pride.   

Skin soothing & nourishing suitable for all skin types including:

• Normal, dry & very dry
• Sensitive
• Dermatitis & Eczema prone skin
• Ideal for baby & infants

Advanced skincare technology formulation:
o Lanolin Hydro Technology – 3-way action transforms moisture sapped, tight & dry parched skin – Hydrate, Restore & Protect
o Fragrance & colour free
o Dermatologically tested
o pH balanced
o Non-comedogenic (won’t block pores)

Lanolin Hydro Technology - 3-way action transforms moisture sapped, tight & dry parched skin.
? Uber-moisturising super-hydrator lanolin carries 200% of its weight in water to infuse the skin with moisture. 
? Restore the skin lipids by assisting their function to hold moisture within the skin.
? Protect with a barrier on the skins surface locking moisture in and irritants out. 

Warnings

Store below 30°C.
Recycable
External Use Only

Common Uses

Moisturising, Moisturiser, Hydration,Lotion

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Mineral Oil (Paraffinum Liquidum), PEG-40 Stearate, Propylene Glycol , Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate , Laureth-4 , Lanolin Oil , Carbomer , Phenoxyethanol, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, Triethanolamine , Polysorbate 20

Directions

Apply day and night or as often as required. Use especially after showering, bathing, shaving and exposure to harsh climatic conditions. For persistent dry skin and mild skin irritations use in conjunction with Alpha Keri Skin Hydrating Body Wash. For external use only.  If irritation develops, discontinue use.
